body_html:
Hi Clived2, Thanks for your comments and reply.

What I observed that , if I read my error, it is missing Wheel package in my local libraries. Due to proxy issues, my machine not able to download required packages for installation from Internet.

As a workaround, what I did is based on error kept downloading and locally installing number of library packages and finally could install Tensorflow. Atleast 20 different packages needed to supply. If someone has similar proxy issues. Happy to help.

Thanks & Regards.

body:
Hi Clived2, Thanks for your comments and reply.

What I observed that , if I read my error, it is missing Wheel package in my local libraries. Due to proxy issues, my machine not able to download required packages for installation from Internet.

As a workaround, what I did is based on error kept downloading and locally installing number of library packages and finally could install Tensorflow.  Atleast 20 different packages needed to supply. If someone has similar proxy issues. Happy to help.

Thanks & Regards.
